org.opensub4j.api

Interface OpenSubtitles

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OpenSubtitlesImpl

    public interface OpenSubtitles
    opensubtitles.org XML-RPC API client

    • Method Detail

      • serverInfo

        ServerInfo serverInfo()
               throws org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
        Retrieves basic information about the server. It could be used for ping or telling server info to client, no valid UserAgent is needed.
        Returns:
        server information
        Throws:
        org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException

      • login

        void login(java.lang.String lang,
           java.lang.String useragent)
    throws org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
        Login as anonymous user. Logging in is required before talking to the OSDb server.
        Parameters:
        lang - ISO639 2 letter language code
        useragent - UserAgent registered with OpenSubtitles
        Throws:
        org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException

      • login

        void login(java.lang.String user,
           java.lang.String pass,
           java.lang.String lang,
           java.lang.String useragent)
    throws org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
        Login given user, set interface language and initiate session. Logging in is required before talking to the OSDb server. Login user {user} identified by password {pass} communicating in language {lang} and working in client application {useragent}. This function should be always called when starting communication with OSDb server to identify user, specify application and start a new session (either registered user or anonymous). If user has no account, blank username and password should be used.
        Parameters:
        user - username
        pass - password
        lang - ISO639 2 letter language code
        useragent - UserAgent registered with OpenSubtitles
        Throws:
        org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException

      • logout

        void logout()
     throws org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
        Logout the user and end the session. This method should always be called just before exiting the application.
        Throws:
        org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException

      • noop

        void noop()
   throws org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
        This method is used to keep the session alive while client application is idling. Should be called every 15 minutes between XML-RPC requests (in case user is idle or client application is not currently communicating with OSDb server) to keep the connection alive while client application is still running. It can be also used to check if given session is still active.
        Throws:
        org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException

      • searchSubtitles

        java.util.List<SubtitleInfo> searchSubtitles(java.lang.String lang,
                                             java.io.File file)
                                      throws java.io.IOException,
                                             org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
        Search for subtitle files matching your videos using a movie file.
        Parameters:
        lang - ISO639-3 language code
        file - Movie file
        Returns:
        Information about found subtitles
        Throws:
        org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
        java.io.IOException

      • searchSubtitles

        java.util.List<SubtitleInfo> searchSubtitles(java.lang.String lang,
                                             java.lang.String imdbId)
                                      throws org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
        Search for subtitle files matching your videos using IMDB ids. If {lang} is empty or contains the string 'all' - search is performed for all languages. Please note that some fields (IDSubMovieFile, MovieHash, MovieByteSize, MovieTimeMS) are missing in output when using this method.
        Parameters:
        lang - ISO639-3 language code
        imdbId - IMDB movie ID
        Returns:
        Information about found subtitles
        Throws:
        org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException

      • downloadSubtitles

        java.util.List<SubtitleFile> downloadSubtitles(int subtitleFileID)
                                        throws org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
        Download given subtitle file
        Parameters:
        subtitleFileID - ID of the subtitle file to download
        Returns:
        Subtitle files
        Throws:
        org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException

      • searchMoviesOnImdb

        java.util.List<MovieInfo> searchMoviesOnImdb(java.lang.String query)
                                      throws org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
        Searches for movies matching given movie title {query}. Returns list of movies data found on IMDb.com and in internal server movie database. Manually added movies can be identified by ID starting at 10000000.
        Parameters:
        query - Query string
        Returns:
        Information about found movies
        Throws:
        org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
